1:
Oh, sing to Yahweh a new song,
\q for he has done marvelous things;
\q his right hand and his holy arm have given him victory.
\q
2:
Yahweh has made known his salvation;
\q he has openly showed his justice to all the nations.
4:
Shout for joy to Yahweh, all the earth;
\q burst into song, sing for joy, and sing praises.
5:
Sing praises to Yahweh with the harp,
\q with the harp and melodious song.
\q
6:
With trumpets and the sound of the horn,
\q make a joyful noise before the King, Yahweh.
7:
Let the sea shout and everything in it,
\q the world and those who live in it!
\q
8:
Let the rivers clap their hands,
\q and let the mountains shout for joy.
\q
